About Me

I am a junior web developer currently enrolled in the Vanderbilt Coding Bootcamp. Before entering this program, I was a student at the University of Tennessee, Knoxville studying engineering. During my tenure at the University I enlisted in the Air National Guard as an Emergency Manager and have served for the past 7 years. Through this period I have had the opportunity to be in two different positions on McGhee Tyson ANG Base and have transitioned between two other jobs in the civilian world. I am a dedicated individual who wants to make an impact wherever I'm at. I am always looking for new opportunities to learn and to improve myself.

Work

Run Buddy

Built With: HTML, CSS

This is an page that will allow you to find someone to go running with. It will also allow you to find a trainer to suit your needs in order to improve the aspects that you want to improve.

View Project on Github

Taskinator

Built With: JavaScript, HTML, CSS

This is a dynamic task tracking tool that will allow you to create new tasks. Through this, you are also able to order the tasks in sections titled "Tasks to Do", "Tasks in Progress", and "Tasks Completed".

View Project on Github

Taskmaster Pro

Built With: JavaScript, HTML, CSS, Bootstrap

This is an updated version of Taskinator. Along with a polished display, the user enhancements created with javascript allow for a smoother and more professional feel to the application.

Robot Gladiators

Built With: JavaScript

This is a very basic game that allows you to fight virtual robots from your webpage. You will start off with health and a score and will be taken through different battles. Along the way, you will be allowed to go into the shop to buy upgarades and health in order to beat your next opponent. Good luck!
